name: Berserker's Call
desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

name: Dream Coil
desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Flesh Golem
desc: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

name: Battle Hunger
desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Icarus Dive
desc: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

name: Mana Void
desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Repel
desc: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Rip Tide
desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

name: Warcry
desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.
